author: freeCodeCamp.org
description:
Welcome to the comprehensive Vue.js course, designed to take you from beginner to proficient Vue developer. This course covers everything from Vue fundamentals and reactivity to advanced topics like component communication, routing, and state management with Pinia. Through hands-on examples and practical projects, you'll learn how to build dynamic and interactive web applications using Vue.

Access code and course resources here: https://www.dotnetmastery.com/Home/Details?courseId=33

Course developed by Bhrugen Patel.

⭐️ Contents ⭐️
⌨️ (0:00:00) Introduction - YT
⌨️ (0:11:09) Vue Fundamentals
⌨️ (0:30:03) Reactivity in Vue
⌨️ (0:40:40) Directives in Vue
⌨️ (1:09:31) Styles in Vue
⌨️ (1:26:19) Events in Vue
⌨️ (1:40:18) Data binding
⌨️ (2:18:03) Forms
⌨️ (2:37:15) Create Project
⌨️ (2:59:56) Components
⌨️ (3:15:00) Component communication
⌨️ (3:46:29) Provide and Inject
⌨️ (4:13:36) Slots and Lifecycle
⌨️ (4:57:12) Routing
⌨️ (5:52:13) API Requests
⌨️ (6:15:57) Pinia

❤️ Try interact
title: Vue.js Course for Beginners
